item.title: Version 1.2.8
item.description:
What's New

Fix VNI typing logic and improve cursor position handling

  • Enhance VNEngine to properly handle VNI diacritics and tone marks
  • Fix cursor position tracking to prevent incorrect character deletion
  • Improve isTypingMidSentence flag handling in CharacterInjector
  • Add comprehensive unit tests for VNI input scenarios
  • Update README with Window Title Rules setup instructions
  • Version 1.2.8
